statements: SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE userId = 1;
SELECT userId, theme FROM UserPreferences WHERE ARExperienceEnabled = TRUE;
SELECT theme, language FROM UserPreferences WHERE userId > 5;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE theme LIKE 'Dark%' AND language = 'English';
SELECT DISTINCT theme FROM UserPreferences WHERE language = 'French';
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE userId = 1;
SELECT userId, theme FROM UserPreferences WHERE language = 'English';
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE ARExperienceEnabled = true;
SELECT userId, theme, language FROM UserPreferences WHERE theme = 'Dark' AND language = 'French';
SELECT userId, language, ARExperienceEnabled FROM UserPreferences ORDER BY userId DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE theme = 'dark';
SELECT user_id, font_size FROM user_preferences ORDER BY font_size DESC;
SELECT ar_model, ar_effects FROM ar_experiences WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM ar_experiences ORDER BY experience_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE language = 'English' ORDER BY theme DESC;
SELECT user_id, ar_model FROM ar_experiences WHERE ar_model LIKE '%car%' AND ar_effects IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, font_size FROM user_preferences WHERE font_size >= 14 ORDER BY user_id ASC, font_size DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ar_experiences WHERE user_id = 3 AND ar_effects LIKE '%sparkle%' GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, setting_name, setting_value FROM user_settings WHERE setting_id = 3;

SELECT event_id, event_name, event_description FROM ar_experiences WHERE event_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM user_preferences ORDER BY preference_name DESC;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM user_settings WHERE user_id = 2 AND setting_name LIKE '%theme%';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM ar_experiences WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM ar_experiences WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT user_id, font_size FROM user_preferences ORDER BY font_size DESC;

SELECT user_id FROM notification_settings WHERE push_notifications = TRUE;

SELECT theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE font_size > 12;
SELECT * FROM ar_settings WHERE ar_distance BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT user_id, push_notifications FROM notification_settings WHERE email_notifications = true;
SELECT custom_setting_1, custom_setting_2 FROM custom_preferences WHERE user_id = 3;

SELECT exp_name, exp_description, exp_rating FROM ar_experiences ORDER BY exp_rating DESC;

SELECT user_id, theme, language, notifications FROM preferences WHERE notifications = TRUE;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT exp_name, exp_description FROM ar_experiences ORDER BY exp_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE notifications = TRUE;
SELECT u.user_name, p.theme, s.background_color FROM users u JOIN preferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN settings s ON u.user_id = s.user_id;
